00050 struct Articulation {
00051       Sym sym;
00052       QString name;
00053       bool inStaff;           // place int staff
00054       bool above;             // place always above note
00055       };

00062 class NoteAttribute : public Symbol {
00063    public:
00064 
00065    private:
00066       NoteAttributeIdx val;
00067 
00068    protected:
00069       virtual bool startDrag(const QPointF&) { return true; }
00070 
00071    public:
00072       NoteAttribute(Score*);
00073       NoteAttribute(Score*, NoteAttributeIdx idx);
00074       NoteAttribute(const NoteAttribute& a);
00075       virtual NoteAttribute* clone() const { return new NoteAttribute(*this); }
00076       void setIdx(NoteAttributeIdx);
00077       int idx() const { return val; }
00078       virtual void read(QDomNode);
00079       virtual void write(Xml& xml) const;
00080       virtual QRectF drag(const QPointF& s);
00081       Chord* chord() const { return (Chord*)parent(); }
00082       QString name() const { return atrList[val].name; }
00083 
00084       static Articulation atrList[];
00085       };

00110 //---------------------------------------------------------
00111 //   Note
00112 //    changePitch()         computes _line and _accidental
00113 //                          resets _userAccidental
00114 //    changeAccidental()    computes _pitch
00115 //
00116 //    setPitch()/setAccidental() do what the name says
00117 //---------------------------------------------------------
00118 
00119 class Note : public Element {
00120       int _pitch;             // note pitch as midi value
00121       int _userAccidental;    // -1 - automatic accidental
00122       int _line;              // y-Position; 0 - top line
00123       int _move;              // -1, 0, +1
00124       Prefix* _accidental;
00125 
00126       Sym _sym;         // note head
00127       DurationType _durationType;
00128       bool _grace;
00129       bool _mirror;     // note is mirrored at stem
00130       int _dots;
00131       Fingering* _fingering;
00132 
00133       Tie* _tieFor;
00134       Tie* _tieBack;
00135 
00136       int _lineOffset;  // used during mouse dragging
00137 
00138       virtual bool startDrag(const QPointF&);
00139       virtual QRectF drag(const QPointF& s);
00140       virtual void endDrag();
00141 
00142    public:
00143       Note(Score*);
00144       Note(Score*, int pitch, bool grace = false);
00145       Note(const Note&);
00146       ~Note();
00147       virtual Note* clone() const { return new Note(*this); }
00148 
00149       void bboxUpdate();
00150       bool grace() const            { return _grace; }
00151       void setGrace(bool val)       { _grace = val;  }
00152 
00153       void setTicks(int);
00154       int totalTicks() const;
00155       void setType(DurationType);
00156       void setDots(int n)           { _dots = n; }
00157       int dots() const              { return _dots; }
00158 
00159       double headWidth() const      { return _sym.width(); }
00160       Sym* noteHead()               { return &_sym;  }
00161 
00162       int pitch() const             { return _pitch; }
00163       void setPitch(int val)        { _pitch = val; }
00164       void changePitch(int val);
00165       int move() const              { return _move; }
00166       void setMove(int val)         { _move = val; }
00167 
00168 
00169       int userAccidental() const      { return _userAccidental; }
00170       void setUserAccidental(int i)   { _userAccidental = i; }
00171       int accidentalIdx() const       { return _accidental ? _accidental->idx() : ACC_NONE; }
00172       Prefix* accidental() const      { return _accidental; }
00173       void setAccidental(int);
00174       void changeAccidental(Score*, int);
00175 
00176       int line() const                { return _line + _lineOffset;   }
00177       void setLine(int n)             { _line = n;      }
00178 
00179       Fingering* fingering() const    { return _fingering; }
00180 
00181       virtual void add(Element*);
00182       virtual void remove(Element*);
00183 
00184       bool mirror() const             { return _mirror; }
00185       void setMirror(bool val)        { _mirror = val;  }
00186 
00187       Tie* tieFor() const             { return _tieFor;     }
00188       Tie* tieBack() const            { return _tieBack;    }
00189       void setTieFor(Tie* t)          { _tieFor = t;        }
00190       void setTieBack(Tie* t);
00191 
00192       Chord* chord() const            { return (Chord*)parent(); }
00193       void setChord(Chord* a)         { setParent((Element*)a);    }
00194 
00195       virtual void draw1(Painter&) const;
00196       virtual void read(QDomNode);
00197       virtual void write(Xml& xml) const;
00198       QPointF stemPos(bool upFlag) const;    // point to connect stem
00199       Element* findSelectableElement(QPointF p) const;
00200       };

00202 //---------------------------------------------------------
00203 //   NoteList
00204 //---------------------------------------------------------
00205 
00206 class NoteList : public std::multimap <const int, Note*> {
00207    public:
00208       NoteList::iterator add(Note* n) {
00209             return std::multimap<const int, Note*>::insert(std::pair<const int, Note*> (n->pitch(), n));
00210             }
00211       Note* front() const { return (begin() != end()) ? begin()->second : 0;  }
00212       Note* back()  const { return (begin() != end()) ? rbegin()->second : 0; }
00213       Note* find(int pitch) const;
00214       };
00215 
00216 typedef NoteList::iterator iNote;
00217 typedef NoteList::reverse_iterator riNote;
00218 typedef NoteList::const_iterator ciNote;
00219 typedef NoteList::const_reverse_iterator criNote;

00229 class ChordRest : public Element {
00230    protected:
00231       Beam* _beam;
00232       BeamMode _beamMode;
00233       Tuplet* _tuplet;
00234       bool _up;
00235 
00236    public:
00237       ChordRest(Score*, ElementType t);
00238       ChordRest(const ChordRest& r);
00239 
00240       void writeProperties(Xml& xml) const;
00241       bool readProperties(QDomNode);
00242 
00243       Segment* segment() const      { return (Segment*)parent(); }
00244 
00245       void setBeamMode(BeamMode m);
00246       BeamMode beamMode() const     { return _beamMode; }
00247       void setBeam(Beam* b)         { _beam = b; }
00248       Beam* beam() const            { return _beam; }
00249       void setTuplet(Tuplet* t);
00250       Tuplet* tuplet() const        { return _tuplet; }
00251       Measure* measure() const      { return (Measure*)(parent()->parent()); }
00252       int beams() const;
00253       virtual int move() const = 0;
00254 
00255       virtual void layoutStem()     {}
00256       virtual int upLine() const    { return 0;}
00257       virtual int downLine() const  { return 8;}
00258       virtual int line(bool up) const { return up ? upLine() : downLine(); }
00259       virtual QPointF stemPos(bool, bool) const { return pos(); }    // point to connect stem
00260       bool isUp() const             { return _up; }
00261       void setUp(bool val)          { _up = val; }
00262       };

00280       void readSlur(QDomNode, int staff);
00281 
00282    public:

00287

00293

00298       void setGrace(bool g)                  { _grace = g; }
00299 
00300       virtual void layoutStem();

00302       const NoteList* noteList() const       { return &notes; }
00303       const Note* upNote() const             { return notes.back(); }
00304       const Note* downNote() const           { return notes.front(); }
00305       Note* upNote()                         { return notes.back(); }
00306       Note* downNote()                       { return notes.front(); }
00307       virtual int move() const;
00308 
00309       pstl::plist<HelpLine*>* helpLineList() { return &helpLines; }
00310 
00311       Stem* stem()                           { return _stem; }

00314

00322

00325 
00326       Element* findSelectableElement(QPointF p) const;
00327       virtual int upLine() const      { return upNote()->line(); }
00328       virtual int downLine() const    { return downNote()->line(); }
00329       virtual void space(double& min, double& extra) const;
00330       };
